alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:08PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wichita and southeastern Greeley Counties through 915 PM MDT/1015 PM CDT/... At 807 PM MDT/907 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Tribune, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leoti. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
